scenario_text.value:
Man... There are too many webs on this door.
I doubt we’ll be able to open it.

Still, that piano is definitely coming from
inside. Someone has to be in there.

(And not just the piano...is that a girl?
I can hear some beautiful humming.)
Hmm, what do you think we should do, Agumon?

Aww, I’m sorry, Takuma... Not even my claws
will work here.
Huh? The piano and the humming both stopped?

...Should I just go ahead and try to call out
to them?

Hey! Is anybody in there?! If there is,
please respond!

No response...
In fact, it’s dead silent in there.

(What’s going on in there... Don’t tell me
it’s actually a ghost?!)

Huh, I swear I can feel someone in there,
though...

Uh, at any rate, it doesn’t look like we can
get in here. Let’s go <color=#B41919>someplace else</color>!
